bio: Nicholas Skiles is a skilled criminal defense attorney with extensive experience representing clients charged with DUI offenses, drug crimes, and other criminal matters throughout Pennsylvania. With a background in criminal justice and specialized training in DUI defense, Skiles provides aggressive and knowledgeable representation to individuals facing serious criminal charges. As a certified DUI defense attorney and member of the National College for DUI Defense, Skiles has completed advanced training in field sobriety testing, breath and blood testing procedures, and the scientific evidence used in DUI prosecutions. His practice focuses on challenging the evidence in DUI cases, including questioning the reliability of chemical tests, the validity of traffic stops, and the administration of field sobriety tests. Skiles has successfully defended hundreds of DUI cases, often achieving dismissals, reduced charges, or alternative sentencing options for his clients. He also handles drug possession cases, assault charges, theft offenses, and other misdemeanor and felony matters. Skiles is known for his thorough investigation of cases, attention to detail, and aggressive courtroom advocacy. He regularly attends continuing education seminars to stay current with evolving DUI laws and defense strategies.
